title: Additive Manufacturing of Hollow Connected Networks for Solar Photo-Fenton-Like Catalysis

Miguel Angel Gracia-Pinilla, Norma Ramos, Cristian Rosero, Remco Sanders, Stephan Bartling, Jedrzej Winczwski, Han J.G.E. Gardeniers, Arturo Susarrey-Arce
A 3D-printing approach is used to fabricate the green bodies/precursor microarchitectures that, upon annealing, allow the production of hierarchical 3D hollow microarchitectures (3DHMs). The 3DHMs are composed mainly of TiO2...
